name: John Wick: Destiny of a Collective
detailed_description:
"Chad Stahelski & David Leitch are veterans with decades of stunt work, performing and 2nd Unit directing under their belts. Years of hard work, dedication and creativity have finally led to their action-design Studio, 87Eleven, getting the opportunity to make this truly unique action movie.
"
